Hi All,

I'm trying to adapt this code:

http://www.wpftutorial.net/LocalizeMarkupExtension.html

So that it will still allow the nice binding syntax in XAML but will also only load resources from the individual modules.  I've already adapted the manager class to support multiple ITranslationProviders but I can't crack the problem of working out which translation provider to retrieve the value from when the value is asked for.

Or is there an altogether better strategy for localizing a prism app with resources held in multiple assemblies?

Thanks,

Hi,

Based on my understanding, localizing of a WPF Prism application should be similar to localizing a WPF only application.

I believe you might find the following threads interesting to fulfill the requirements of your scenario:

  • Multi-lingual application
  • Localization with Prism

I hope you find this handy
